meta_title: What is Calibration? Definition, Process, and Importance
meta_description: Calibration is the process of comparing an instrument against a known standard to ensure accuracy. Understand its role in compliance, safety, and maintenance.
title: Definition of Calibrate

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Definition of Calibrate

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic image of a professional technician in a clean, modern industrial laboratory. The technician is wearing a white lab coat and safety glasses, carefully using a high-precision digital calibrator to verify a pressure gauge. The background features organized workstations with various measurement standards and calibration certificates. The lighting is bright and clinical, emphasizing a high-tech, compliant environment. No text or logos.
